title: CartographicRectangle
description: A two dimensional region specified as `[WestLongitude, SouthLatitude, EastLongitude, NorthLatitude]`. If the array has four elements, the value is constant. If it has five or more elements, they are time-tagged samples arranged as `[Time, WestLongitude, SouthLatitude, EastLongitude, NorthLatitude, Time, WestLongitude, SouthLatitude, EastLongitude, NorthLatitude, ...]`, where Time is an ISO 8601 date and time string or seconds since epoch.
